response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This product has been meticulously crafted to meet and exceed your expectations, offering unparalleled value and benefits that align perfectly with your needs. We understand its immense worth to you, estimated at $1,200,000. Our proposal is to offer it to you at a strategic price of $1,150,000. This presents a unique chance for you to secure this remarkable item at a premium yet competitive rate. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of a seamless transaction process and exceptional customer service to ensure your satisfaction. We look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Warm regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1150000}
